| Player wins        = Sofia Arvidsson (50–38)

| Doubles wins       = Johanna Larsson (16–10)

The Sweden Billie Jean King Cup team represents Sweden in the Billie Jean King Cup tennis competition and is governed by the Swedish Tennis Association, known in Swedish as .
History
Sweden competed in its first Fed Cup in 1964.  Their best result was reaching the quarterfinals on four occasions.
Current team (2017)
*Johanna Larsson
*Jacqueline Cabaj Awad
*Cornelia Lister
*Mirjam Björklund
